title: Actual holidays=No Snowdown Shop
body: Doesn't this kind of suck for those of us who are on holidays and don't have access to a computer during the showdown shop >< Can't they give a one day extension for those of us who haven't logged on during snowdown -.-

replies.body: They should give us an extension anyway because the Snowdown Shop didn't work for about a day on release and had multiple problems throughout the holidays.
